mapper.insert: insert into projet.Utilisateur(cip, Nom, Prenom, Courriel) values (#{person.cip}, #{person.last_name}, #{person.first_name}, #{person.email}) on conflict (cip) do nothing;
mapper.select: select cip, last_name, first_name, email, programme, promotion from projet.Utilisateur where (cip) = (coalesce(#{cip}, cip))
